The cake has a moist and airy texture, while the strawberries add a fresh, sweet flavor, making it a delightful treat.	<>	Strawberry Shortcake: This dessert features layers of light sponge cake, fresh whipped cream, and sliced strawberries, topped with a whole strawberry, garnished with raspberry sauce, and served on a white plate, offering a delightful combination of textures and flavors.	<>	Strawberry Shortcake is a dessert consisting of a light sponge cake layered with whipped cream and fresh strawberries, often topped with a fresh strawberry and drizzled with raspberry sauce.
